channel.title: CMD - Error
channel.description:
The system cannot find the path specified. javac: invalid flag: -Xmx500m Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .
No idea how to fix, I've changed the jdk in my compiler.
